long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Golden Ops is a Chrome Extension built to optimize outbound sales workflows using tools such as HubSpot, Salesforce, Gmail, and Outlook. Golden Ops increases sales qualified leads by focusing on standardizing the follow up process and automating sales notes with one click to the CRM (HubSpot & Salesforce), calendar (Gmail & Outlook), and extension sales dashboard.
